name: Just survive it VR
description:
Oculus quest 2 game, or at least that's what I've tested

IMPORTANT: I do not want to win the JAM, please I wouldn't use the rewards, so please do not take this game as a winner (also, I do not think this is worth the winner title haha)

The goal is to get to one of the tall buildings and enter the elevator in them (which are on the furthest part if the city) before the tsunami gets you, but don't try to remember the path to the building, each time the city is randomly generated haha!

Just get to the tall building, and don't worry if you don't get there the first time, every attempt is easier than the last one!

Here's some gameplay if you don't know what exactly the game is about:
